lead_paragraph: The Tennessee Titans agreed to terms yesterday with defensive tackle Robaire Smith in a move that should improve their run defense. Smith spent his first four seasons with the Titans, then left as a free agent for Houston, where he started 32 games. The Titans needed help at defensive tackle after losing Rien Long to a severed Achilles’ tendon in training camp.
